data.title: The Critical Fortunes of Pythagoras’ Probes
data.meta_description: Pythagoras is one of the most important scholars of all time. He made vital discoveries that continue to be applied today in various educational fields. His most influential contribution is the Pythagorean theorem, which was named after him and attained applicability...
